title: Solomon Snacks and Bakery Recalls Meat Pie Products Produced Without Benefit of Inspection and Due To Misbranding and Undeclared Allergens
summary: WASHINGTON, June 4, 2016 Solomon Snacks and Bakery, a New Brighton, Minn. establishment, is recalling approximately 873 pounds of meat pie products that were produced without the benefit of federal inspection and due to misbranding and undeclared allergens, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety...
